channel.title: gamedev on David Wesst
channel.description: Recent content in gamedev on David Wesst

item.title: Where to Find Your Gamedev Community
item.description: Four places to find your new game development and/or design and/or technology community and figure out if it’s even good! Did you know there are people out there who will help you with your game because they WANT TO DO IT? I know, right? This magical place is called a “community” and they exist literally all over the world. You just need to find one. In this video, I talk about four different places to find technology and game development/design communities right from where your sitting.

item.title: GitHub Game Off 2019 Game Jam featuring DW
item.description: For the past month I have been participating in the GameOff 2019 Gamejam hosted by GitHub over on Itch.io and I’ve been devlogging about it over on my YouTube channel.
